page.title: 09INDUSTRY IN NAIRN
page.content: The{Claymore Creamery}has been open since 1951.Its{17}lorries collect milk from surrounding farms and deliver the factory's end products of milk, cream, butter, cottage cheese and low calorie milk.The factory employs{70}people and as they still do a door to door milk delivery their roundsmen begin work at {04.00}until{13.00.}The rest of the work force are employed from{08.00.} until{17.00. {MACKINTOSH'S LEMONADE FACTORY}has been making lemonade for{90}years.It has{5} employees who work{5}days a week,{8} hours a day. Two lorries go on the road and make deliveries within a twenty-five mile radius of the town.The present owner is the third generation to make lemonade.
